name: Termination of appointment; special administrator
text: §560:3-618   The appointment of a special administrator terminates in accordance with the provisions of the order of appointment or on the appointment of a general personal representative.  In other cases, the appointment of a special administrator is subject to termination as provided in sections 560:3-608 through 560:3-611. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1]
